meanings.definition: The process or period of flowering.
meanings.sent1: In spring, the florescences of the cherry blossoms bring beauty to the park.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with colorful florescences as the flowers bloomed.
meanings.sent3: The florescences of the roses seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a field of florescences, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The florescences of the daisies painted the meadow in a sea of white.

meanings.definition: The state or period of flowering.
meanings.sent1: The florescences of the trees signaled the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent2: The florescences of the plants added a burst of color to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The florescences of the sunflowers turned towards the sun each day.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like the florescences of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The florescences of the tulips brightened up the dull sidewalk.

meanings.definition: The act or process of flowering.
meanings.sent1: The florescences of the roses captivated everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The florescences of the daffodils brought joy to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The florescences of the lilies seemed to bloom overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like the florescences of a garden in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The florescences of the orchids were delicate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: The state or period of flowering.
meanings.sent1: The florescences of the cherry blossoms were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The florescences of the wildflowers painted the meadow in a riot of colors.
meanings.sent3: The florescences of the peonies bloomed gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like the florescences of a song, filling the room with melody.
meanings.sent5: The florescences of the irises stood tall and proud in the garden.
